filming_locations: Almería Railway Station, Almería, Andalucía, Spain
title: Per qualche dollaro in più
plot: Two bounty hunters are after the same man, Indio. At first, they go their own ways, but eventually get together to try and find him. But are they after him for the same reason ?
plot_simple: Two bounty hunters with completely different intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.
